offense.name: Shield Breaker
offense.description: Increases damage inflicted to targets under Shield buffs by 25%.

offense.name: Grim Resolve
offense.description: Increases damage inflicted by 5% when HP is less than 50%.

offense.name: Heart of Glory
offense.description: Increases damage inflicted by 5% when HP is above 80%.

offense.name: Whirlwind of Death
offense.description: Increases SPD by 6 for each enemy killed by this Champion, up to 18 SPD.
